entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 60%
